channel.title: What Case
channel.description: I added operate to my items. Now what case # is it to make them work serverside? Like when you right click the item in when you are wielding it, it says operate but idk where to add the code server sided.

item.title: What Case
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:2, topic:304398”][quote author=sheeba link=topic=400684.msg2970738#msg2970738 date=1253935456]
I added operate to my items. Now what case # is it to make them work serverside?
Like when you right click the item in when you are wielding it, it says operate but idk where to add the code server sided.
[/quote]
you add it in clickingmost.java
and the case depending on how u do it, will eather be the id of the item, or the id of the operate when u click it , u can find that id by clicking on it and it will say on ur run.bat[/quote]

Thats the problem… It does not show.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 10:46:08 am[/size][hr]bump?

Read full topic

item.title: What Case
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“sheeba, post:1, topic:304398”]I added operate to my items. Now what case # is it to make them work serverside?
Like when you right click the item in when you are wielding it, it says operate but idk where to add the code server sided.[/quote]
you add it in clickingmost.java
and the case depending on how u do it, will eather be the id of the item, or the id of the operate when u click it , u can find that id by clicking on it and it will say on ur run.bat
